con:request.name: ForgotPasswordModule
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate><!--Optional:-->
         <module code="ForgotPasswordModule" license="GPL" description="Rest password">
            <script code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.ForgotPassword" description="ForgotPassword">
               <!--Optional:-->
               <type>JAVA</type>
               <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.UUID;

import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.service.admin.impl.UserService;
import org.meveo.service.script.module.ModuleScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class ForgotPassword extends ModuleScript{
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ForgotPassword.class);
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext, User user) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		UserService userService = (UserService) getServiceInterface("UserService");
		String emailRequest = (String) initContext.get("email");
		String emailValue = null;
		JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
	    try {
			Object obj = parser.parse(emailRequest);
			JSONObject jsonObject = (JSONObject)obj;
			emailValue = (String) jsonObject.get("email");

		} catch (ParseException e) {
			throw new BusinessException("Cant parse request :"+e.getMessage());
		}
		log.debug("emailValue:" + emailValue);
		User userThatManyForget = userService.findByEmail(emailValue);
		if(userThatManyForget == null){
			throw new BusinessException("Cant find user "+emailValue);
		}
		String newPasswd = UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 7);
		log.debug("newPasswd:" + newPasswd);
		userThatManyForget.setNewPassword(newPasswd);
		userService.update(userThatManyForget, user);
	}
}
               ]]></script>
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            </script>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <moduleItems>
               <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 19 items at this level-->
         <notification code="ForgotPasswordInReqNotif">
            <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest</classNameFilter>
            <eventTypeFilter>INBOUND_REQ</eventTypeFilter>
            <elFilter>#{event.pathInfo.startsWith("/${#Project#provider}/forgotPassword")}</elFilter>
            <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.ForgotPassword</scriptInstanceCode>
            <scriptParams>
               <entry>
                  <key>email</key>
                  <value>#{event.getBody()}</value>
               </entry>
            </scriptParams>
         </notification>
			<emailNotif code="ForgotPasswordEmailNotif">
				<classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.admin.User</classNameFilter>
				<eventTypeFilter>UPDATED</eventTypeFilter>
				<emailFrom>bot@opencellsoft.com</emailFrom>
				<subject>Password reset</subject>
				<emailToEl>#{event.email}</emailToEl>
				<elFilter>#{event.newPassword ne null}</elFilter>
				<body>Bonjour,
				Text modifiable
				user name  :  #{event.userName}
				password   :  #{event.newPassword}
				access url :  http://i.meveo.info/meveo/frontend/DEMO/index.html
				</body>
				</emailNotif>
            </moduleItems>
         </module>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.UUID;

import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;

public class ForgotPassword extends ModuleScript{
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ForgotPassword.class);
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext, User user) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		UserService userService = (UserService) getServiceInterface("UserService");
		String emailRequest = (String) initContext.get("email");
		String emailValue = null;
		JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
	    try {
			Object obj = parser.parse(emailRequest);
			JSONObject jsonObject = (JSONObject)obj;
			emailValue = (String) jsonObject.get("email");
			
		} catch (ParseException e) {			
			throw new BusinessException("Cant parse request :"+e.getMessage());
		}	   	      
		log.debug("emailValue:" + emailValue);
		User userThatManyForget = userService.findByEmail(emailValue);
		if(userThatManyForget == null){
			throw new BusinessException("Cant find user "+emailValue);
		}
		String newPasswd = UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 7);
		log.debug("newPasswd:" + newPasswd);
		userThatManyForget.setNewPassword(newPasswd);
		userService.update(userThatManyForget, user);
	}
}

con:request.name: AddAccessModule
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate><!--Optional:-->
         <module code="AddAccessModule" license="GPL" description="AddAccessModule">           
            <script code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.CreateAccess" description="AddAccess">
               <!--Optional:-->
               <type>JAVA</type>
               <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription;
import org.meveo.service.medina.impl.AccessService;
import org.meveo.service.script.module.ModuleScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class CreateAccess extends ModuleScript {	
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CreateAccess.class);		
	
	@Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext, User user) throws BusinessException {
		AccessService accessService = (AccessService) getServiceInterface("AccessService");
		Subscription subscription = (Subscription) methodContext.get("subscription");
		if(subscription == null){
			throw new BusinessException("subscription is null");
		}
		log.debug("subscription.getCode() : "+subscription.getCode());		
		org.meveo.model.mediation.Access access = new org.meveo.model.mediation.Access();
		access.setSubscription(subscription);
		access.setAccessUserId("ACC_"+subscription.getCode());
		access.setStartDate(new Date());
		access.setEndDate(null);
		accessService.create(access, user);
    }	
}
               ]]></script>
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            </script>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <moduleItems>
            
               <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 19 items at this level-->  
         <notification code="AddAccessNotif">
            <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription</classNameFilter>
            <eventTypeFilter>CREATED</eventTypeFilter>
            <elFilter></elFilter>
            <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.CreateAccess</scriptInstanceCode>
            <scriptParams>
               <entry>
                  <key>subscription</key>
                  <value>#{event}</value>
               </entry>
            </scriptParams>
         </notification>	       
            </moduleItems>
         </module>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.RegisterHierarchy" description="Register crm hierarchy">
             <type>JAVA</type>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.api.account.AccountHierarchyApi;
import org.meveo.api.dto.account.CRMAccountHierarchyDto;
import org.meveo.api.exception.MeveoApiException;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.JsonUtils;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class RegisterHierarchy extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {	
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RegisterHierarchy.class);			
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext, User user) throws BusinessException {		
		log.info("Execute...");
		AccountHierarchyApi accountHierarchyApi = (AccountHierarchyApi) getServiceInterface("AccountHierarchyApi");
		String body = (String) initContext.get("body");
		log.info("body:"+body);
		CRMAccountHierarchyDto crmAccountHierarchyDto = JsonUtils.toObject(body, CRMAccountHierarchyDto.class);
		log.info("crmAccountHierarchyDto"+crmAccountHierarchyDto);	
			
		try {
			accountHierarchyApi.createCRMAccountHierarchy(crmAccountHierarchyDto, user);
		} catch (MeveoApiException e) {			
			e.printStackTrace();
		}	
	}
}
           ]]></script>
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createBusinessAccountModel>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <businessAccountModelDto code="Client" license="GPL" description="BAM for selfcare accounts">
          <moduleItems>
			<customFieldTemplate code="password" description="password">
				<fieldType>STRING</fieldType>
				<appliesTo>CUST</appliesTo>
				<storageType>SINGLE</storageType>
			</customFieldTemplate>
			<emailNotif code="SelfcareAccountCreationNotif">
				<classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.admin.User</classNameFilter>
				<eventTypeFilter>CREATED</eventTypeFilter>
				<emailFrom>bot@opencellsoft.com</emailFrom> 
				<subject>Create Selfcare account</subject>
				<emailToEl>#{event.email}</emailToEl>
				<body>Bonjour, \n
				Text modifiable\n
				user name  :  #{event.userName}\n
				access url :  http://i.meveo.info/meveo/frontend/DEMO/index.html
				</body> 
			</emailNotif>
         <notification code="SelfcareRegistration">
            <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest</classNameFilter>
            <eventTypeFilter>INBOUND_REQ</eventTypeFilter>
            <elFilter>#{event.pathInfo.startsWith("/${#Project#provider}/registration")}</elFilter>
            <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.RegisterHierarchy</scriptInstanceCode>
            <scriptParams>
               <entry>
                  <key>body</key>
                  <value>#{event.getBody()}</value>
               </entry>
            </scriptParams>
         </notification>		
         <script code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.RegisterHierarchy" description="Register crm hierarchy">
             <type>JAVA</type>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.api.account.AccountHierarchyApi;
import org.meveo.api.dto.account.CRMAccountHierarchyDto;
import org.meveo.api.exception.MeveoApiException;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.JsonUtils;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class RegisterHierarchy extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {	
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RegisterHierarchy.class);			
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext, User user) throws BusinessException {		
		log.info("Execute...");
		AccountHierarchyApi accountHierarchyApi = (AccountHierarchyApi) getServiceInterface("AccountHierarchyApi");
		String body = (String) initContext.get("body");
		log.info("body:"+body);
		CRMAccountHierarchyDto crmAccountHierarchyDto = JsonUtils.toObject(body, CRMAccountHierarchyDto.class);
		log.info("crmAccountHierarchyDto"+crmAccountHierarchyDto);		
		try {
			accountHierarchyApi.createCRMAccountHierarchy(crmAccountHierarchyDto, user);
		} catch (MeveoApiException e) {			
			e.printStackTrace();
		}	
	}
}
           ]]></script>
         </script>         	
		</moduleItems>
           <script code="org.meveo.service.script.SelfcareAccountScript" description="Script BAM for selfcare accounts">
          <type>JAVA</type>
          <script>
             <![CDATA[
		package org.meveo.service.script;
		import java.math.BigDecimal;
		import java.nio.charset.Charset;
		import java.security.MessageDigest;
		import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException; 
		import java.util.List;
		import java.util.HashSet;
		import java.util.Map;
		import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
		import org.meveo.api.dto.account.CRMAccountHierarchyDto;   
		import org.meveo.api.dto.UserDto; 
		import org.meveo.api.exception.MeveoApiException;
		import org.meveo.commons.utils.StringUtils;
		import org.meveo.model.admin.User;    
		import org.meveo.service.script.account.AccountScript;
		import org.meveo.model.AccountEntity;
		import org.slf4j.Logger;
		import java.util.Set;
		import java.util.ArrayList;
		import org.meveo.model.security.Role;
		import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomerService;
		import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
		import org.meveo.model.crm.Customer;
		import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomFieldInstanceService;
		import org.meveo.api.UserApi;

		public class SelfcareAccountScript extends AccountScript {
		
		private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SelfcareAccountScript.class);
		private Map<String, Object> initContext = null;
		
		static MessageDigest messageDigest = null;
		static {
		try {
		messageDigest = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
		} catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) {
		}
		}
		CustomFieldInstanceService customFieldInstanceService = (CustomFieldInstanceService) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldInstanceService");
		CustomerService customerService = (CustomerService) getServiceInterface("CustomerService");
		UserApi userApi = (UserApi) getServiceInterface("UserApi");
		
		@Override
		public void createAccount(Map<String, Object> methodContext , User currentUser) throws BusinessException { 
		AccountEntity account = (AccountEntity) methodContext.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY);
		UserDto user = new UserDto();
		CRMAccountHierarchyDto accountDto = (CRMAccountHierarchyDto) methodContext.get(AccountScript.CONTEXT_ACCOUNT_HIERARCHY_DTO);
		Customer customer = customerService.findByCode(accountDto.getCode(), currentUser.getProvider());
		String password =(String) customFieldInstanceService.getCFValue(customer, "password", currentUser);
          log.debug("accountCode : "+accountDto.getCode(), " crmAccountType :"+accountDto.getCrmAccountType());
          
		String email = accountDto.getContactInformation().getEmail(); 
		user.setEmail(email);
		if(accountDto.getName()!=null){
		user.setFirstName(accountDto.getName().getFirstName());
		user.setLastName(accountDto.getName().getLastName());
		}
		user.setUsername(accountDto.getCode());
		user.setPassword(password);  
		List<String> roles = new ArrayList<String>();
		roles.add("selfcareDefault");
		user.setRoles(roles);
         log.debug("lastName :"+user.getLastName() + " firstName : "+user.getFirstName() + " email : "+user.getEmail() + " password : "+user.getPassword());
		try{
		userApi.create(user, currentUser);
		}catch(MeveoApiException e){
		log.error("failed to create user ",e); 
		e.printStackTrace();
		}
		}
		}]]>
		</script> 
		</script> 
            <hierarchyType>C_UA</hierarchyType>
         </businessAccountModelDto>
      </ws:createBusinessAccountModel>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Shell executor
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.startsyscmd.ShellExecutor" description="Executes a script to setup the provider">
            <!--Optional:-->
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.startsyscmd;

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.Map;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.api.dto.account.CRMAccountHierarchyDto;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.JsonUtils;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class ShellExecutor extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {

         private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ShellExecutor.class);

         public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext,User user) throws BusinessException {
              log.debug("Executing shell command...");

           	  String code = (String) initContext.get("code");
           	  log.info("Create provider: " + code + " (created by user " + user.toString() + ")");		

               String result="";
               ProcessBuilder   ps=new ProcessBuilder("deployProvider",code);
               ps.redirectErrorStream(true);
               Process pr;
               try {
                 pr = ps.start();
                 BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(pr.getInputStream()));
                 String line;
                 while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
                   result+=line;
                 }
                 pr.waitFor();
                 in.close();
               } catch (IOException e) {
                 throw new BusinessException(e);
               } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                 throw new BusinessException(e);
               }
               log.info("result command :"+result);
               initContext.put("result",result);
		}
}
]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
         </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>
